snippet.title: Super Mario 3D All-Stars – Explore the world of Super Mario Sunshine – Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Sun’s out and Isle Delfino is calling in Super Mario Sunshine – one of three adventures included in the Super Mario 3D All-Stars game.

Learn more about Super Mario 3D All-Stars: [Microsite URL]
